answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Chinn – I hope the following is helpful:
San Francisco City/County – Workforce and Succession Planning Report
A tad dated, but looks good
http://www.sfdhr.org/Modules/ShowDocument.aspx?documentid=2468 
MTAS - City of McMinnville Succession Plan & A Model for Small Tennessee Municipalities
http://www.mtas.tennessee.edu/Knowledgebase.nsf/0/7948D7A9D217F2688525768D004A3BEC/$FILE/Model%20Succession%20Plan.pdf 
Anderson, SC - PPT SUCCESSFUL SUCCESSION PLANNING ANDERSON’S APPROACH
http://www.masc.sc/SiteCollectionDocuments/Human%20Resources/Anderson.pdf 
The Mejorando Group – Approach to Succession Planning & Management
Alliance Corporate Partner
http://www.gettingbetterallthetime.com/successplan 
Municipal Association of South Carolina – news article “Succession planning and risk management”
http://www.masc.sc/programs/solutions/insurance/riskletter/Spring-2012/Pages/Succession-planning-and-risk-management.aspx 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Chinn Park MAGIC
text:
Hi,
We are seeking any staffing succession or strategic staffing plans for critical IT functions. Specifically, we are looking for Public Safety Radio Communications, but any staffing succession plans for an IT department would be welcome. 
Thanks,
Karen Garrett
Management and Government Information Center (MAGIC)
Chinn Park Regional Library
13065 Chinn Park Drive
Prince William, VA 22192
magic2@pwcgov.org
703-792-4880
703-792-4612 fax
title: Staffing Succession/Strategic Staffing Plans for IT
